definitions: Thoroughly confused and disoriented
So bewildered your brain files a missing persons report
example: The IKEA instructions left me completely bumfuzzled

definitions: Cheated or deceived in an old-timey way
Bamboozled with extra frontier spirit
example: I got hornswoggled by a guy selling magic beans

definitions: A shrewd unprincipled person, especially a politician
Someone who seeks power purely for personal gain
example: Every election cycle brings out the snollygosters

definitions: Wasting time in the most aimless way possible
Professional-grade dawdling and doing nothing
example: Stop lollygagging and help me move this couch

definitions: Complete nonsense or utter rubbish
Something so false it insults your intelligence
example: That excuse is utter codswallop and you know it

definitions: An overblown uproar about nothing important
Maximum drama for minimum reason
example: The whole brouhaha was over a parking spot

definitions: A commotion or fuss about something trivial
An unnecessary disturbance caused by pettiness
example: There was a huge kerfuffle over who ate the last donut

definitions: Askew, crooked, or positioned all wrong
When something is diagonal and nobody knows why
example: That picture frame has been cattywampus for months

definitions: A spectacularly stupid or foolish person
Someone whose decision-making defies all known logic
example: Only a nincompoop would iron clothes while wearing them

definitions: Absolute nonsense and foolish talk
Words so absurd they barely qualify as language
example: His entire keynote speech was pure balderdash

definitions: Foolish behavior and ridiculous shenanigans
Nonsense of the highest and most committed order
example: I will not tolerate any more tomfoolery in this household

definitions: A warning shout before emptying chamber pots from windows
The medieval equivalent of look out below
example: Medieval pedestrians lived in constant fear of the cry above

definitions: British slang for making out passionately
Aggressive face-to-face contact of the romantic variety
example: They were snogging in the back of the theater like teenagers

definitions: British term for the act of self-pleasure
Also means wasting time or being useless
example: He spent all day wanking about instead of finishing the report

definitions: The rectal consumption of beverages, usually alcoholic
A fraternity innovation that made national headlines
example: The dean banned all beverages after the incident

definitions: Doing something without any protection or preparation
Also means enduring a long flight with no entertainment
example: He rawdogged a twelve-hour flight with no headphones

definitions: An insult combining bodily acoustics with baked goods
A term so absurd it can only be used ironically
example: You absolute queefcake, that was the fire alarm

definitions: A mischievous creature dwelling in the worst possible location
A person who causes chaos from a position of pure evil
example: That assgoblin in IT disabled everyone's VPN on purpose

definitions: A person who is both useless and slightly flammable as an insult
Someone whose only purpose is to be set ablaze with criticism
example: That shitwick left the stove on and went on vacation

definitions: British vulgar slang for female anatomy
Made famous by The Inbetweeners as a comedic term
example: The Inbetweeners made this word mainstream and parents were horrified

definitions: Shortened form of scrotum used as a casual British insult
A wrinkly insult for wrinkly people
example: That little scrote nicked my parking spot

definitions: A sexual act so revolting that learning the definition is a form of assault
The word that ended a thousand dinner conversations
example: Someone searched this at work and got escorted out

definitions: The fabric panel in underwear, or the stain upon it
A textile term ruined by bodily association
example: The laundry situation revealed horrors in the gusset region

definitions: A neologism created to embarrass a politician
A frothy mixture that redefined political name recognition
example: The internet renamed a bodily byproduct after a senator

definitions: Old English vulgar term for female genitalia
An insult so archaic it sounds almost scholarly
example: Shakespeare probably used this word and scholars just glossed over it

definitions: Being as repulsive and clueless as biological buildup suggests
A Red Dwarf certified state of idiocy
example: That was the most smegheaded decision in company history
